attributes.action: allow fire-fighters to use their hoses as water cannon to knock down those who choose to try and prevent them doing their job
attributes.additional_details:
The Fire Brigades MUST be allowed to do their job without distraction.
Any individual causing "distraction" should not be allowed to complain if Fire-fighters turn their hoses on them.
Anyone preventing Fire Brigades from saving lives and property should know that they risk high pressure water blown at them.
